h1_title: Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough
content: He will also leap up and pound his fists down onto the ground, causing a shockwave of rocks immediately around him. As long as you dive out of the way when he goes to land or step back from him slightly, you can avoid this attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water_Curtain_Cave_and_Birthstone_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Birthstone - Heart of Birthstone' and the sub-subsection 'The Stone Monkey Phase One'.
The content is as follows:
He will also leap up and pound his fists down onto the ground, causing a shockwave of rocks immediately around him. As long as you dive out of the way when he goes to land or step back from him slightly, you can avoid this attack.
